creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure standing in 3/4 pose, holding papers or cards in PL hand and a whip like object in PR hand; blank banner wraps over top of man; rocks and weeds at feet

title: The Shoemaker
